description: Variation of Legal Agreement in relation to Planning Permission Ref: 192597OPDFUL (Construction of an additional 10 storeys on Block A comprising 73 flats (44 x 1 bed and 29 x 2 bed); 4 storeys on Block C comprising 24 flats (24 x 1 bed); provision of a minimum 35% of the total number of additional habitable rooms as affordable housing in Block B, and associated changes to the basement and ground floor levels to provide additional cycle storage and minor changes to the approved landscaping layout [resulting in 97 additional flats overall, bringing the total number on-site up to 701 (comprising 426 x 1 bed, 242 x 2 bed and 33 x 3 bed)) - to change the affordable housing tenure of the 31 units in Block B from the agreed agreed combination of 60% London Affordable Rent (19 units, comprising 9 x 1, 3 x 2, 7 x 3 bed) and 40% London Living Rent (12 units comprising 6 x 1 bed and 6 x 3 bed) to all Discount Market Rent at a 20% discount to Open Market Values
